GeneDef.label: darkness adaptation
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special organ that reacts to unnatural darkness. When exposed to darkness for a long time, it begins to produce a special smell that repels creatures hiding in it.

customEffectDescriptions.li: After prolonged <color=#8a8ae6>darkness exposure</color>, makes the pawn <color=#8a8ae6>immune</color> to this effect.
The immunity disappears 24 hours after the last <color=#8a8ae6>exposure</color>.
